channel.title: Compile prob

item.title: Compile prob
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

You cannot have try { without } catch {

[code=Java] if (command.startsWith(“kill”) && playerRights >= 2) {
String otherPName = command.substring(5);
try {
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
if (otherPIndex != -1) {
client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
p.deathStage = 1;
p.sM("You have been killed by " + playerName);
sM("You have killed " + p.playerName + “.”);
talk(otherPName + " has been killed by " + playerName);
} else {
sM(“The name doesnt exist.”);
}
} catch (Exception e) {

		}
	}[/code]

item.title: Compile prob
item.dc:creator: @Music8 Music8
item.description:

here it is i need this to be fixed i am making kill command and i m stuck on this compile command

client.java:9951: 'try' without 'catch' or 'finally' try { ^ 1 error Finished! Press any key to continue . . .

command is

} if (command.startsWith("kill") && playerRights >= 2); String otherPName = command.substring(5); try { int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID (otherPName); if (otherPIndex != -1) { client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; p.deathStage = 1; p.sM("You have been killed by " + playerName); sM("You have killed "+p.playerName+"."); talk(otherPName+" has been killed by " + playerName); } else { sM("The name doesnt exist."); } }

help please
